title: Pilot
description: Millionaire Edward Stratton III, an overgrown child, learns that he has a son, Ricky, from a previous marriage.

title: Boys Will Be Boys
description: Kate tells Ricky that Edward's relaxed attitude toward discipline does not mean he doesn't love Ricky.

title: Grandfather Stratton
description: Ricky tries to reconcile Edward with his father.

title: Me and Mr. T
description: Ricky gets a black eye when he stands up to the school bully. Edward hires Mr. T as his bodyguard.

title: Takin' a Chance on Love
description: Ricky gets his first taste of puppy love when a new girl transfers to his school. Ricky probes Edward about his true feelings for Kate.

title: Evelyn Returns
description: Evelyn, Edward's ex-wife and Ricky's mother shows up and wants to take Ricky. Leonard tells Edward he could fight but is he willing to let the fall out get to Ricky.

title: The Great Computer Caper
description: Ricky's expertise in computers attracts the attention of Arnold Jackson (from "Diff'rent Strokes"), school reporter at P.S. 98 in New York City. Ricky impresses Arnold by hacking into a military computer system, but when Arnold publishes their discoveries in the school paper it attracts the attention of the FBI.

title: I'm Just Wild About Harry
description: While out with Derek on a late-night expedition, Ricky captures and brings home an orangutan that he wants to keep as a pet.

title: Honor Thy Father
description: Ricky saves his grandfather from embarrassment when his dad Edward refuses to speak at a banquet in honor of his father.

title: Father Nature
description: Ricky convinces Edward to cancel his skiing trip and take him camping so that he can earn a scouting merit badge. However, the trip turns out to be a complete disaster.

title: A Little Magic
description: Convinced that Kate and Edward should be together, Ricky decides to play matchmaker.

title: Falling in Love Again
description: Kate goes on a grudge date to make Edward jealous. It works, and Edward professes his love in the middle of Carnegie Hall.

title: The Best Christmas Ever
description: Edward and Ricky spend their first Christmas together by playing Santa to a family with a young boy.

title: The Most Beautiful Girl in the World
description: After Derek saves Ricky's life, Ricky is forced to pose as Derek's date at a co-ed party.

title: Twelve Angry Kids
description: Ricky and Edward are sued for a false whiplash claim. Leonard and Ricky convince the judge that the case be presented to a jury of peers - other kids.

title: The Toy Wonder
description: Edward wants to hire a 12-year-old girl as a toy consultant, but she'll only take the job on one condition - that Ricky become her boyfriend.

title: Popcorn
description: When his band needs to raise money for a trip to Washington, D.C., Ricky commits Edward to buying 1000 bags of popcorn, without his approval or knowledge.

title: Junior Businessman
description: For a school assignment, Edward lets Ricky manage an ice cream parlor for a week.

title: Three's a Crowd
description: Ricky is miffed when Kate joins his ski trip with Edward.

title: The Empire Strikes Out
description: Grandfather Stratton tries to get Kate to move to California with a job opportunity so Edward will marry someone to expand the family fortune.

title: Won't You Go Home, Bob Danish
description: A man from Kate's past intentionally crashes his small plane on the grounds of the Strattons' estate in order to impress her.

title: The X Team
description: Kate catches Ricky and his friends watching an X-rated film during a sleepover.

title: Passports to Pleasure
description: After Ricky's Badger Patrol Leader pulls out at late notice, Kate and Ricky convince Edward to take the boys to the National Badger Convention in Chicago. While there Derek and Ricky hatch a plan to get lucky with some high school girls.

title: Attack of the Giant Frog People
description: Ricky has his friends Derek, JT and Freddy for a sleep over, but the boys play a cruel prank on Freddy. Ricky feels guilty after the prank, while Kate over identifies with the taunting.

title: A Fair to Remember
description: After getting in trouble in class, Ricky sets out to win the 8th Grade Science Project, with a little help from Kate, who is trying to prove a point with Edward.

title: The Hospital
description: Edward, Kate and Ricky are all set for a picnic until Edward suffers from a sudden a gallstone attack, which lands him in the hospital. When an infection sets in Ricky and Kate become even more concerned.

title: Mr. President
description: Ricky daydreams that he is the president of the United States.

title: Driver Ed
description: Grandfather Stratton tries to teach Ricky how to drive.

title: Menudo Madness
description: Ricky promises a girl that the music group "Menudo" will be at his party.

title: Happy Birthday
description: It's Ricky's 13th Birthday and his first with his father. After first thinking his Dad has forgotten his birthday, he wishes for the impossible - which is for Kate, his Dad and his Grandfather to all get along.

title: I Want to Be Alone
description: Edward has organized a mountain cabin for a relaxing family retreat for Ricky and Kate. Ricky invites Dexter as well when he finds he doesn't have much on, but Dexter ends up being anything but relaxed.

title: Mr. Cool
description: Rick, Freddy and pals try to impress some girls by dining and dashing.

title: Changes
description: When Billie the tomboyish pitcher on Ricky's baseball asks Kate for advice on how to be lady, she assumes that Billie has a crush on Ricky. Little do they all know that she has her sights on someone else.

title: A Summer's Romance: Part 1
description: Ricky's classmate Leslie has a crush on him and visits him to help rehearse a play. She brings her mother Veronica, who turns out was an old flame of Edward's. Veronica causes problems when she tries to rekindle the flame.

title: A Summer's Romance: Part 2
description: Edward finds himself in the awkward position of having to choose between Leslie's mother Veronica and Kate when the latter catches him in a passionate kiss with Veronica. Edward must decide between Kate and Veronica, but will Kate stay?

title: Blazing Hotel Rooms
description: While in Miami for a toy convention, Dexter, Edward and Ricky are trapped in their hotel room during a fire.

title: Hi, Mom
description: Kate tries to keep her relationship with Edward a secret from her mother when she arrives for a surprise visit.

title: Survival of the Fittest
description: High school's a whole new ball game for Rick.

title: Village of the Darned: Part 1
description: Ricky and Alfonso are disappointed when they're unable to go a Thanksgiving party, as Edward, Kate and Dexter have decided to take them on a surprise trip to the Caribbean island of St Agnes in the company plane, which Kate is piloting.

title: Beauties and the Beasts
description: Rick, Freddy and Alfonso hold the "Miss Fuller Freshman" pageant where things go wrong.

title: What's Cookin'?
description: Rick's suggestion for a Stratton Flour Mills promotion lands him a job at his grandfather's company.

title: Marry Me, Marry Me: Part 1
description: Kate is concerned that her relationship with Edward is not moving forward, which is her subtle way of saying that she wants to get married and have a family. But Edward still reeling from his first marriage is hesitant. But when Dexter tells him he should marry her, he proposes and Kate accepts. When Ricky learns of this, he's not exactly thrilled. Which leads Edward to blurt that this is what Kate wants which she over hears.

title: Marry Me, Marry Me: Part 2
description: Following Kate's spat with Edward, she decides to leave town for awhile. Edward wanting to see her tracks her down to the cruise ship she's about to leave on. When she decides to go, Edward is heart broken. But she returns and agrees to marry him.

title: Trouble with Words
description: When Alfonso is not doing well in school, Dex thinks he is spending too much time on his dancing. And when Alfonso's grades don't improve, Dex forbids from entering a dance competition. But Bruce Jenner who is trying out some exercise equipment Edward has developed, thinks he knows what Alfonso's problem is.

title: The Secret Life of Ricky Stratton
Head Over Heels
description: Whitney Houston who's a friend of Kate's comes for a visit. And when Dex meets her, he falls for her. Ricky and Edward try to get him to loosen up. And they do such a good job that Dex is no longer paying attention to his work and is even thinking of moving to be with her which doesn't make Alfonso happy.

title: Poor Evelyn
description: Rick's mom comes for a visit. And they discover she's broke. And she refuses to take money from Edward. So Rick asks Edward to give her a job and let her stay with them. And on her first day, she causes nothing but problems.

title: The Great Baseball Card Scheme
description: When Edward's father visits, he has an episode and the doctor tells him to rest. But he gets bored. He needs to do some kind of trading. And when he sees Ricky trading baseball cards, he comes up with his own way to upgrade the card's value. And Ricky becomes just as ruthless when he trades.

title: The Barbarians
description: Edward's father invites him and Ricky to join him at a lodge. And it is there that he unleashes his wild side. When one of his lodge mates plays a prank on him, he sets out to get back at him with Edward and Ricky's help.

title: Three Musketeers
description: Freddy writes a letter that catches the attention of Congressman Tip O'Neill.

title: A Family Affair
description: Ricky is dating a girl named Jeannie. And when they have a spat, her father wants to see Edward. Dexter tells him that he might be "connected" to the mob. And when he arrives he tells Edward to tell Ricky to apologize to his daughter. Edward refuses but when a strike at one of his companies is settled after the man tells him it would work out, Edward thinks he made the union settle so that Edward would be beholden to him.

title: Who's the Boss?
description: Edward resents Kate's success as toy-company head.

title: Let It Snow, Let It Snow
description: Kate and Edward try to have a romantic weekend in the snow, until Rick, Alfonso, Brad and Dexter spoil their plans. Getting time alone is impossible, especially when a blizzard hits their cabin.
